meanings.definition: In a manner that is extremely small or minute in size, beyond the limits of normal microscopic observation.
meanings.sent1: The scientist examined the specimen ultramicroscopically to observe the tiniest details.
meanings.sent2: She studied the bacteria ultramicroscopically using advanced technology.
meanings.sent3: The detective searched ultramicroscopically for clues, even checking under the smallest objects.
meanings.sent4: His attention to detail was so precise that he could ultramicroscopically analyze any material.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted ultramicroscopically, capturing the minuscule beauty of nature.
